page.title: 02A CHILD'S LIFE IN BURTON
page.content: I get up at 7.30 a.m., dress and have breakfast of toast and milk. At about 8.35 a.m. Dad drives me to the bus stop. When I get to school I play until 9.00 a.m. when school starts. After assembly we usually write stories. From 10.45 until 11.00 a.m. we play. We do{mathematics}until noon when we have lunch. School meals are cooked on the premises and we have the choice of paying for a meal or bringing a packed lunch. School resumes at 1.00 p.m., when we sometimes work on the{computer.}During the afternoons we have{music, games, {art or topic work. At 3.15 p.m. I am collected by Mum in the car. When I get home I have tea and watch television. On Monday evenings I go to Girl Guides.
